home-us.title: We simplify the complicated so you can enjoy the important!
home-us.description: At Solutions for Life, we believe that every person deserves to live with peace of mind, confidence, and security. We are a company dedicated to providing easy, efficient, and personalized solutions in insurance, taxes, immigration, and real estate. Our commitment is to accompany you through every important step of your life, offering professional advice, personal attention, and results that make a difference.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro1: This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You.
privacyPolicy.intro2: We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. This Privacy Policy has been created with the help of the Privacy Policy Generator.
privacyPolicy.interpretationText: The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.

definition.account: Account means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service.
definition.affiliate: Affiliate means an entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party, where "control" means ownership of 50% or more of the shares, equity interest or other securities entitled to vote.
definition.company: Company refers to Solutions For Life, 680 Hillcrest Rd NW, Lilburn, GA 30047, USA.
definition.cookies: Cookies are small files placed on Your computer, mobile device or other device by a website.
definition.country: Country refers to: Georgia, United States.
definition.device: Device means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cellphone or a digital tablet.
definition.personalData: Personal Data is any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual.
definition.serviceProvider: Service Provider means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company.
definition.usageData: Usage Data refers to data collected automatically by using the Service or from its infrastructure.
definition.website: Website refers to Solutions For Life, accessible from solutionsforlifeatl.com
definition.you: You means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company/legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service.

privacyPolicy.collectingData: Collecting and Using Your Personal Data
privacyPolicy.personalDataText: While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide Us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify You. Personally identifiable information may include:
privacyPolicy.personalData.name: First name and last name
privacyPolicy.usageDataText: Usage Data is collected automatically when using the Service. Usage Data may include information such as IP address, browser type, browser version, the pages visited, time spent, device identifiers, and diagnostic data.
privacyPolicy.cookiesText: We use Cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity and store certain information. Tracking technologies used are beacons, tags, and scripts.

cookies.necessary: Necessary / Essential Cookies (Session) – to authenticate users and prevent fraud.
cookies.acceptance: Cookies Policy / Notice Acceptance Cookies (Persistent) – to remember cookie consent.
cookies.functionality: Functionality Cookies (Persistent) – to remember login details or language preferences.

use.provideService: To provide and maintain our Service
use.contractPerformance: For the performance of a contract
use.marketing: To provide news, offers, and events unless You opt-out

privacyPolicy.retentionText: The Company will retain Personal Data only for as long as necessary to fulfill purposes set out in this Privacy Policy, to comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce agreements. Usage Data is generally retained for a shorter period unless used to improve security or required by law.
privacyPolicy.transferText: Your information may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of Your state or country. By submitting Your information, You agree to that transfer. We ensure adequate protection is in place.
privacyPolicy.deletionText: You may request deletion of Personal Data at any time. You may update, amend, or delete Your information from within Your Account or by contacting Us. Some information may be retained as required by law.
privacyPolicy.disclosure.business: Business Transactions: If the Company is involved in a merger, acquisition or asset sale, Your Personal Data may be transferred.
privacyPolicy.disclosure.law: Law enforcement: We may disclose Personal Data if required to do so by law.
privacyPolicy.disclosure.other: Other legal requirements: We may disclose Your Personal Data in good faith to comply with legal obligations, protect rights, investigate wrongdoing, ensure safety, or prevent liability.
privacyPolicy.securityText: We use commercially acceptable means to protect Your data, but no transmission or storage is 100% secure.
privacyPolicy.childrenText: Our Service does not address anyone under 13. We do not knowingly collect information from children. If we learn we have done so, we delete it immediately.
privacyPolicy.linksText: Our Service may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices. Please review their policies.
privacyPolicy.changesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page and we will update the "Last updated" date. You are advised to review periodically.

ccpa.limit: Right to Limit Use of Sensitive Personal Data

gdpr.erasure: Right to Erasure (“Right to be Forgotten”)

caloppa.link: Privacy Policy link includes the word "Privacy" and is visible on the homepage
caloppa.changes: We notify users of changes on this page
caloppa.review: Users can review/change Personal Data by logging in or contacting us
caloppa.dnt: We honor Do Not Track (DNT) signals

privacyPolicy.exercisingText: To exercise your rights under CCPA, CPRA, GDPR, or CalOPPA, please contact us. We may require verification of your identity before responding.
privacyPolicy.contact.mail: By mail: 680 Hillcrest Rd NW, Lilburn, GA 30047, USA

cookies.title: Cookies Policy
cookies.intro: This Cookies Policy explains what Cookies are and how We use them. You should read this policy so You can understand what type of cookies We use, or the information We collect using Cookies and how that information is used.
cookies.generator: This Cookies Policy has been created with the help of the Free Cookies Policy Generator.
cookies.noPID: Cookies do not typically contain any information that personally identifies a user, but personal information that we store about You may be linked to the information stored in and obtained from Cookies.
cookies.referPrivacy: For further information on how We use, store and keep your personal data secure, see our Privacy Policy.
cookies.noSensitiveInfo: We do not store sensitive personal information, such as mailing addresses, account passwords, etc. in the Cookies We use.
cookies.interpretationText: The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.
cookies.defCompany: Company (referred to as either "the Company", "We", "Us" or "Our" in this Cookies Policy) refers to Solutions For Life, 680 Hillcrest Rd NW, Lilburn, GA 30047, USA.
cookies.defCookies: Cookies means small files that are placed on Your computer, mobile device or any other device by a website, containing details of your browsing history on that website among its many uses.
cookies.defWebsite: Website refers to Solutions For Life, accessible from https://www.solutionsforlifeatl.com
cookies.defYou: You means the individual accessing or using the Website, or a company, or any legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Website, as applicable.
cookies.typeIntro: Cookies can be "Persistent" or "Session" Cookies. Persistent Cookies remain on your personal computer or mobile device when You go offline, while Session Cookies are deleted as soon as You close your web browser.
cookies.purposesIntro: We use both session and persistent Cookies for the purposes set out below:
cookies.necessaryPurpose: Purpose: These Cookies are essential to provide You with services available through the Website and to enable You to use some of its features. They help to authenticate users and prevent fraudulent use of user accounts. Without these Cookies, the services that You have asked for cannot be provided, and We only use these Cookies to provide You with those services.
cookies.functionalityPurpose: Purpose: These Cookies allow us to remember choices You make when You use the Website, such as remembering your login details or language preference. The purpose of these Cookies is to provide You with a more personal experience and to avoid You having to re-enter your preferences every time You use the Website.
cookies.choicesText1: If You prefer to avoid the use of Cookies on the Website, first You must disable the use of Cookies in your browser and then delete the Cookies saved in your browser associated with this website. You may use this option for preventing the use of Cookies at any time.
cookies.choicesText2: If You do not accept Our Cookies, You may experience some inconvenience in your use of the Website and some features may not function properly.
cookies.choicesText3: If You'd like to delete Cookies or instruct your web browser to delete or refuse Cookies, please visit the help pages of your web browser.
cookies.choices.chromePrefix: For the Chrome web browser, please visit this page from Google:
cookies.choices.iePrefix: For the Internet Explorer web browser, please visit this page from Microsoft:
cookies.choices.firefoxPrefix: For the Firefox web browser, please visit this page from Mozilla:
cookies.choices.safariPrefix: For the Safari web browser, please visit this page from Apple:
cookies.choices.otherBrowsers: For any other web browser, please visit your web browser's official web pages.
cookies.moreInfoText: You can learn more about cookies: Cookies: What Do They Do?.
cookies.contactAddress: By mail: 680 Hillcrest Rd NW, Lilburn, GA 30047, USA

about-us.title: We are an independent company of solutions for life.
about-us.description: We are solutions for life and we dedicate ourselves to offer integrated solutions to improve your life and your relationships. Our team of experts in integrated solutions is committed to offering customized solutions to you so that you can achieve your most Imputes, insurance, health, real estate, immigration, etc.
about-us.description_2: We are solutions for life and we dedicate ourselves to offer integrated solutions to improve your life and your relationships.
about-us.title2: Find security, health and peace in your life.
about-us.description2: With us you will find not only a service, but an ally who works for you to protect your future, reach your goals and make things simpler as you thought they were complicated.
about-us.descrition3: Our commitment is to accompany you on each important step of your life, offering professional advice, close attention and results that mark the difference.
about-us.title3: Defining the future of online experiences!
about-us.description3: At our team, we believe that every person and every family has a unique story, which is why we are dedicated to offering you a personalized, honest, and customized service. Our commitment is to support you every step of the way so you can easily and securely handle your tax, insurance, health, real estate, and immigration matters, with the confidence of knowing you're in good hands. Behind every service is a group of professionals passionate about helping others, who put their knowledge and experience at your service for your peace of mind.
about-us.description4: We are motivated by seeing you achieve your goals, resolve your concerns, and feel the support of a team that listens to you, guides you, and accompanies you every step of the way. More than advisors, we are people working for people—with empathy, respect, and commitment—so that every decision you make is a firm step toward a better future.
about-us.list-1: Essential benefits of your health insurance.
